name: Jewel Blast - Block Puzzle & Jigsaw Puzzle

description:
💎Jewel Blast™ is not only a classic jigsaw puzzle block game, but a challenging slide puzzle game. It’s a jigsaw puzzle game making your brain healthy for a happy life. 🔥

🎉Jewel Blast™, a new relaxing block puzzle & slide game. Thinking, sliding, making jewel crush and clearing the jewel block for higher score!

Take a break at any time with this calming block puzzle & slide game-Jewel Blast™.

👉How To Play Jewel Blast™?
1⃣️: Sliding block to make jewel crush.
2⃣️: The jewel has no support points and will fall.
3⃣️: When filling a line, it will be eliminated and scored.
4⃣️: Continuous elimination will get extra score
5⃣️: The color jewel will eliminate the connection with it.

⭐️. Superb feeling of sliding and jewel crush!
⭐️. No penalties & time limits; You can enjoy Jewel Blast™at your own pace!
⭐️. Easy to play, and jigsaw puzzle game for all ages.
⭐️. NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM! Enjoy jewel sliding puzzle game blast anytime, anywhere!

👉Why Jewel Blast™ is better:
🎈 Easy, interesting, and addictive slide puzzle & block puzzle & jigsaw puzzle game.
🎈 This slide puzzle & block puzzle & jigsaw puzzle game suitable for all ages.

🎈 Casual slide puzzle & block puzzle & jigsaw puzzle game, enjoy puzzle game blast anytime and anywhere.
🎈 A new type of brain training slide puzzle & block puzzle & jigsaw puzzle game, entertain your brain for minutes or hours

📝Tips for Jewel Blast™:
💡 Place the jewel blocks in a reasonable position and make jewel crush.
💡Try to always leave big combo to get more scores.
💡 The more puzzle game blast, the more scores you have.
